articles.title: Nintendo Download: 13th May (North America) - Nintendo Life
articles.description: Famicom Detective Club! Aerial_Knight’s Never Yield! Subnautica!
articles.content: The latest Nintendo Download update for North America has arrived, and it's bringing new games galore to the eShop in your region. As always, be sure to drop a vote in our poll and comment down below… [+13072 chars]

articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.title: Billionaire offers R3bn to help SA develop vaccines - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Patrick Soon-Shiong, a SA-born American transplant surgeon, billionaire businessman, bioscientist, and media mogul, has offered to invest in vaccine development capacity in Africa.

articles.author: Stuart Miller
articles.title: Filming ‘The Underground Railroad’ was grueling. But the cast grasped ‘the weight of what we were doing.’ - The Washington Post
articles.description: The lead actors in Barry Jenkins’s series felt the magnitude of portraying the highs and extreme lows of being Black in antebellum America.
articles.content: Though the show has nuanced storytelling and outstanding cinematography, it perhaps most importantly was approached with deep wells of compassion by Jenkins. It follows the same basic plot as the boo… [+7760 chars]
